typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductKey as decimal(38,0),
		OrderDateKey as decimal(38,0),
		DueDateKey as decimal(38,0),
		ShipDateKey as decimal(38,0),
		CustomerKey as decimal(38,0),
		PromotionKey as decimal(38,0),
		CurrencyKey as decimal(38,0),
		SalesTerritoryKey as decimal(38,0),
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		SalesOrderLineNumber as decimal(38,0),
		RevisionNumber as decimal(38,0),
		OrderQuantity as decimal(38,0),
		UnitPrice as double,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as double,
		DiscountAmount as double,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		SalesAmount as double,
		TaxAmt as double,
		Freight as double,
		CarrierTrackingNumber as string,
		CustomerPONumber as string,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		DueDate as timestamp,
		ShipDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'FactInternetSales',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> FactInternetSales
source(output(
		ProductKey as decimal(38,0),
		ProductAlternateKey as string,
		ProductSubcategoryKey as decimal(38,0),
		WeightUnitMeasureCode as string,
		SizeUnitMeasureCode as string,
		EnglishProductName as string,
		SpanishProductName as string,
		FrenchProductName as string,
		StandardCost as double,
		FinishedGoodsFlag as decimal(38,0),
		Color as string,
		SafetyStockLevel as decimal(38,0),
		ReorderPoint as decimal(38,0),
		ListPrice as double,
		Size as string,
		SizeRange as string,
		Weight as double,
		DaysToManufacture as decimal(38,0),
		ProductLine as string,
		DealerPrice as double,
		Class as string,
		Style as string,
		ModelName as string,
		EnglishDescription as string,
		FrenchDescription as string,
		ChineseDescription as string,
		ArabicDescription as string,
		HebrewDescription as string,
		ThaiDescription as string,
		GermanDescription as string,
		JapaneseDescription as string,
		TurkishDescription as string,
		StartDate as timestamp,
		EndDate as timestamp,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'DimProduct',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> DimProduct
source(output(
		CurrencyKey as decimal(38,0),
		CurrencyAlternateKey as string,
		CurrencyName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'DimCurrency',
	schemaName: 'DBO',
	store: 'snowflake') ~> DimCurrency
FactInternetSales, DimProduct join(FactInternetSales@ProductKey == DimProduct@ProductKey,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, DimCurrency join(FactInternetSales@CurrencyKey == DimCurrency@CurrencyKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2 aggregate(groupBy(ProductAlternateKey,
		EnglishProductName,
		CurrencyAlternateKey),
	UnitPrice = sum(UnitPrice)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	tableName: 'pricesByProduct_dataflow',
	schemaName: 'REFINED',
	deletable: false,
	insertable: true,
	updateable: false,
	upsertable: true,
	keys: ['ProductAlternateKey'],
	store: 'snowflake',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SnowflakeRefined
